item.title: How do i change where the wilderness is?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

these are your non wild coards. looks something like

(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||

yes?

anyway heres your format for adding a new nonwild area

(absX >= SOUTH WEST X COORD && absX <= NORTHEAST X COORD && absY >= SOUTH WEST Y COORD && absY <=NORTH EAST Y COARD ) ||

add that insert your coards. remember when you make it it will be a

| | <---- NON WILD AREA

Read full topic
